text: if the more superficial people could just look past the Dreamcast graphics. i bet this would have been so much more well known and popular outside the minority that has actually experienced the game. one of the most memorable rpg games of all time for me.. since this was the first game to introduce me to the genre itself. maybe it's time to see if my old GC still works :D

text: While this track sometimes moves me to tears (all I can think about is that little girl wondering what "white bread" is like, because all she's ever eaten is hard, black bread.), I don't really think it's all that nice to listen to. It's perfect for it's setting, and did it'd job better then I thought possible... but I don't like it. Probably because it represents poverty so strongly to me.
